subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Alejandro Bedoya, a free agent who played recently in Sweden, is in training camp with the United States national soccer team, unsure of where he will next be playing.
